The debate centered on the most wrenching issue before the Senate and the nation, the costly and deadly ongoing deployment of U.S.

John Warner, the Republican Chair of the Arms Services Committee, warned his colleagues to take care not to send signals that the nation might be losing its resolve in Iraq.
Our credibility is on the line.
So I say to my colleagues, as you approach this vote, it will be one of the most important that you have ever cast.
